participant_1.name: Michaela
participant_1.personality: Michaela is creative and introspective, with a passion for hands-on activities. She is open about her fears and past, showing a deep emotional side.
participant_1.background: Michaela was adopted at a young age and has faced challenges in her personal life, including overcoming trauma. She finds solace in gardening and has a close relationship with her adoptive parents.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is outgoing and empathetic, with a knack for engaging conversations. He enjoys meeting new people and is supportive of others’ experiences.
participant_2.background: Jordan comes from a tight-knit family and has always valued friendships. He works as a barista and often volunteers in his community, believing in the power of connection.

content.text: I enjoy working with my hands and I love gardening since I was a kid
I have a fear that I would like you to know that I am so terrified of clowns due to the childhood trauma
By the way I don’t know who are my Biological mother and father I have been adopted by two elderly
I’m currently working in a gas station
My father has been trying to put me on blind dates
What about you how is your life
